metadata.creator: Revitalize Music Contest
metadata.description:
WFMU and the Free Music Archive challeged artists everywhere to create new recordings and contemporary arrangements of historic compositions available in the public domain. It's our first Revitalize Music Contest.

 

To inspire entries, we handpicked a selection of out-of-copyright songs with compelling lyrics, beautiful melodies, and unusual stories. Keep in mind that unless materials are listed in our contest repository here below, the recordings of performances of these songs are still within the scope of copyright.

 

Any questions? Drop us a line.
metadata.title: Revitalize Music Contest
